Eureka

(a Titles &
Air Dates Guide)

by TVmaze

Last updated:
Mon, 12 Oct 2015 -1:00
aired from: Jul 2006
to: Jul 2012
cancelled/ended		 77 eps Syfy (US) 60 min sci-fi
  • Colin Ferguson as Sheriff Jack Carter
  • Salli Richardson as Allison Blake
  • Joe Morton as Henry Deacon
  • Erica Cerra as Jo Lupo
  • Neil Grayston as Douglas Fargo
  • Jordan Hinson as Zoe Carter [ 1-4 ]
  • Niall Matter as Zane Donovan [ 2-5 ]
  • Ed Quinn as Nathan Stark [ 1-3 ]
  • Kavan Smith as Deputy Andy 2.0 [ 4-5 ]
  • Felicia Day as Dr. Holly Marten [ 4-5 ]
  • Trevor Jackson as Kevin Blake [ 4-5 ]
  • Debrah Farentino as Beverly Barlowe [ 1 ]
  • Matt Frewer as Jim Taggart [ 1 ]
  • Jaime Ray Newman as Tess Fontana [ 3 ]
  • Christopher Gauthier as Vincent

A fairly ordinary man becomes sheriff in a town full of scientific geniuses working on secret government projects.
